author: jstrachan
msg: Added support for bridges in the Messagelet engine.
This allows messages to be consumed on one JMS connection, subject and selector and publish them on another JMS connection and destination.
For example this mechanism can be used to bridge SpiritWave messages to some other JMS provider like MQSeries.
Also the subscription.xml has been modified a little, adding a new <bridge> element and using 'connection' and 'subject' to refer to the JMS connection name and destination.

author: jstrachan
msg: Added sleep property to the Producer task so that messages can be throttled with a simple sleep time between sends.

author: jstrachan
msg: The ProducerTask is now working. Added build.xml targets that demonstrate it in action. There are classpath issues so its usually easier to pass in the Messenger.xml to use in the Ant task.

author: jstrachan
msg: Added a jmsSend Ant Task for sending files to a JMS provider via Ant using ants filesets. Still needs more work and testing but its almost there

author: jstrachan
msg: Added comment to where thread-pool based subscription could be added to increase parallelism of subscriptions and message processing.
